name: Civica Digital Mexico S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Developer of digital Software-as-a-service platform designed to digitize government-to-citizen services. The company's web-based portal provides software and data integration services and helps governments to citizen digital services, including forms, documents, workflows, e-signature, payments, and citizen IDs for full workflow automation, focused on public sector and governments, helping clients to have the appropriate feedback on the services they provide to the community.
